page.title: 15EDUCATION SOUTH OF BARRHEAD
page.content:
There are no schools within the area so children must travel to Barrhead, Neilston or Newton Mearns for Primary education and Barrhead or Newton Mearns for Secondary education.
CREDITS..... The information contained in the survey of the area south of Barrhead was collected and collated by Primary 6 & 7 pupils from{SPRINGHILL {PRIMARY SCOOL, BARRHEAD.
Head teacher....{Miss A.M. Knox.
Primary 7 ....{Mrs. Edith McMillan } teacher (co-ordinator)
Barrhead High {Mr.D.Ian McMillan School ....{ }(data input)
